info.name: NovelUpdates Dark Theme
info.description: My NovelUpdates dark theme. This is the style I use on all of my devices because it's my favourite - because obviously I designed it to my tastes. It should work on most modern browsers but I've only ever dabbled with CSS and I just used whatever seemed to work for me (I use Firefox).
info.additionalInfo:
Light grey rows are the newly released chapters, darker grey are your read chapters and the (even) darker grey ones are just normal chapters.

The style should finally be completed! This is about the best that my style for this website will get - at least with my limited knowledge and experience with CSS. This is partly also due to the annoying way that different styling techniques are employed on different pages. In the future if I get any better with CSS or have more time I might come back and improve it but it works fine for now. If you have any suggestions feel free to let me know!
